sentence.Network_en: The State Department is simply not equipped to handle interdepartmental machinery.
sentence.Network_cn: 国务院根本不具备驾驭部际机构的能力.

sentence.Network_en: Well - considered overall plans unify interdepartmental activities.
sentence.Network_cn: 经过周密考虑的整体计划,可使各部门间的活动协调一致.

sentence.Network_en: Most importantly, I recognized the importance of controls and interdepartmental communication.
sentence.Network_cn: 最重要的是, 我意识到控制和跨部门的沟通的重要性.
